amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Development Assistance Fund by $25 million to conform with the foreign aid authorization.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to cut $24 million of the funds appropriated for the Development Assistance Fund to conform the appropriation to the funding levels specified in authorizing legislation, H.R. 1561.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gilman amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 218 (Roll no. 420).
